auth.checkEmailToVerify: Please check your email to verify your account before logging in.
auth.termsAgreement: By creating an account, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

validation.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
validation.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.displayNameTooShort: Display name must be at least 3 characters
validation.displayNameTooLong: Display name must be 30 characters or less

welcome.title: Welcome to Shiojiri Rainbow Seeker
welcome.subtitle: Welcome to Rainbow Seeker
welcome.description: Capture and share beautiful rainbows you find in Shiojiri City. Connect with the local community through rainbow discoveries.

camera.title: Capture Rainbows
camera.subtitle: Capture Rainbows
camera.description: When you spot a rainbow, capture it with the in-app camera. Your discovery will be recorded with location data and shared with others.

gallery.title: Browse Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Browse Gallery
gallery.description: View rainbow photos captured by other users in the gallery. Interact with likes and comments.

map.title: Explore on Map
map.subtitle: Explore on Map
map.description: See rainbow discovery locations on the Shiojiri City map. Explore where rainbows have been spotted.

notifications.title: Get Notifications
notifications.subtitle: Get Notifications
notifications.description: Receive notifications when new rainbows are discovered or when someone likes or comments on your posts.

feed.title: Feed
feed.subtitle: Rainbow Sightings in Shiojiri
feed.beFirstToShare: Be the first to share a rainbow!

photo.title: Title
photo.deletePhotoConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this photo?

settings.title: Settings
settings.rainbowAlertsDesc: Get notified about rainbow sightings nearby
settings.publicProfileDesc: Allow others to see your profile
settings.downloadMyDataDesc: Export all your data as a ZIP file
settings.deleteAccountWarning: Deleting your account will permanently remove all your data
settings.accountWillBeDeleted: Your account will be permanently deleted on {{date}}
settings.deleteAccountConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete your account?

deleteAccountWarningList.profile: Remove your profile and account data

settings.gracePeriodInfo: You will have {{days}} days to cancel this request
settings.finalConfirmationMessage: This is your final confirmation. Once confirmed, your account deletion will be scheduled and you will have {{days}} days to cancel.
settings.afterGracePeriod: After {{days}} days, all your data will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered.
settings.cancelDeletionQuestion: Are you sure you want to cancel the account deletion request?
settings.cancelDeletionMessage: Your account will remain active and all your data will be preserved.
settings.exportDataMessage: We will collect all your personal data (profile, photos, comments, likes) and send you an email with a download link when it's ready.
settings.downloadLinkValidity: The download link will be valid for 48 hours.

errors.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again
